"COVID vaccines manipulate your DNA" No, they don't. But you know what DOES manipulate your DNA? CORONAVIRUSES.

It's amazing how much misinformation about vaccines is actually pretty accurate about the disease they protect you against. "COVID vaccines cause erectile dysfunction!" No, actually COVID can cause erectile dysfunction and vaccines can prevent it.

Pervasive myths claim COVID vaccines are dangerous for fertility, pregnancy and sexual function. Just the opposite is true—it's COVID that is dangerous for fertility, pregnancy and sexual function. Here's the evidence: https://t.co/E18UKvCsIb by @ejwillingham on @sciam
